testcase.name: #editBook > When Book not exist > Throw an exception
#getAuthor > When the id is not null > When no book is found > Throw an exception
#getBooks > When there are no books > Return empty list
#add > When Book is added and author not exist > Throw an exception
#editBook > When book data is null > Throw an exception
#add > When Book is added and author exist > Return book
#getBook > When the id is null > Throw an exception
#deleteBook > When id is invalid > Throw an exception
#deleteBook > When confirmationDelete is not True > Throw an exception
#getBook > When the id is not null > When a book is found > Return the book
#add > When book data is null > Throw an exception
#editBook > When Book is edited and author not exist > Throw an exception
#editBook > When Book is edited and author exist > Return book
